# The Fading Moon and the Radiant Cross

## Psalm 19:1
The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the waning moon, we are reminded of the fleeting nature of our earthly pursuits. Yet, even as its light diminishes, the stars shine brighter, testifying to the enduring power of God's love. Like the moon's gentle illumination, our faith is not a constant, brilliant light, but rather a reflection of the radiant cross that shines brightly in our souls. We are called to trust in the unchanging love of God, even as the world around us seems to fade. In the stillness of the night, let us fix our eyes on the starry expanse and be drawn to the hope that lies within.

## Prayer
We lift our eyes to the heavens, Lord, and ask that you would guide us toward the unshakeable hope that resides in your love. Help us to trust in your sovereignty, even as the world around us changes.

## One-Line Application
May the enduring light of the stars remind us to fix our eyes on the radiant love of God.
